name: The two sides of the mirror
name_original: The two sides of the mirror
description: Your goal is the get to the flags. You can move with the arrow keys and switch between the two players with space. You can push the boxes, and if you stand on them and press down you can kick them. If you press down while standing in a window, you will get teleported to the other one.(For some reason it doesn't let it run in the browser so you have to download it, unzip it and run index.html.)
